data.name: RichTextBox1.Text
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Invoice xmlns="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:Invoice-2" xmlns:cac="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonAggregateComponents-2" xmlns:cbc="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonBasicComponents-2" xmlns:ext="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonExtensionComponents-2"> <!-- معلومات الفاتورة العامة --> <cbc:ProfileID>reporting:1.0</cbc:ProfileID> <cbc:ID>INV-20250516145004</cbc:ID> <cbc:UUID>355ee59c-f4a4-40e1-bd78-a1ab0fc8eab0</cbc:UUID> <cbc:IssueDate>2025-05-16</cbc:IssueDate> <cbc:IssueTime>14:50:04</cbc:IssueTime> <cbc:InvoiceTypeCode name="012">388</cbc:InvoiceTypeCode> <cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>JOD</cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode> <cbc:TaxCurrencyCode>JOD</cbc:TaxCurrencyCode>
<!-- مرجع إضافي للوثيقة --> <cac:AdditionalDocumentReference> <cbc:ID>ICV</cbc:ID> <cbc:UUID>355ee59c-f4a4-40e1-bd78-a1ab0fc8eab0</cbc:UUID> </cac:AdditionalDocumentReference>
<!-- معلومات البائع --> <cac:AccountingSupplierParty> <cac:Party> <cac:PartyIdentification> <cbc:ID>14807394</cbc:ID> </cac:PartyIdentification> <cac:PostalAddress> <cbc:StreetName>شارع الملكة رانيا</cbc:StreetName> <cbc:CityName>عمان</cbc:CityName> <cbc:PostalZone>11181</cbc:PostalZone> <cac:Country> <cbc:IdentificationCode>JO</cbc:IdentificationCode> </cac:Country> </cac:PostalAddress> <cac:PartyTaxScheme> <cbc:CompanyID>10611649</cbc:CompanyID> <cac:TaxScheme> <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID> </cac:TaxScheme> </cac:PartyTaxScheme> <cac:PartyLegalEntity> <cbc:RegistrationName>مجد عوض محمود الجيزاوي</cbc:RegistrationName> </cac:PartyLegalEntity> </cac:Party> </cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
<!-- معلومات المشتري --> <cac:AccountingCustomerParty> <cac:Party> <cac:PartyIdentification> <cbc:ID schemeID="NIN">9999399</cbc:ID> </cac:PartyIdentification> <cac:PostalAddress> <cbc:StreetName>غير معروف</cbc:StreetName> <cac:Country> <cbc:IdentificationCode>JO</cbc:IdentificationCode> </cac:Country> </cac:PostalAddress> <cac:PartyTaxScheme> <cbc:CompanyID>1</cbc:CompanyID> <cac:TaxScheme> <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID> </cac:TaxScheme> </cac:PartyTaxScheme> <cac:PartyLegalEntity> <cbc:RegistrationName>عميل نقدي</cbc:RegistrationName> </cac:PartyLegalEntity> </cac:Party> </cac:AccountingCustomerParty> <!-- وسيلة الدفع --> <cac:PaymentMeans> <cbc:PaymentMeansCode listID="UN/ECE 4461">10</cbc:PaymentMeansCode> <cbc:PaymentID>PAY-INV-20250516145004</cbc:PaymentID> </cac:PaymentMeans> <cac:AllowanceCharge> <cbc:ChargeIndicator>false</cbc:ChargeIndicator> <cbc:AllowanceChargeReason>discount</cbc:AllowanceChargeReason> <cbc:Amount currencyID="JOD">0</cbc:Amount> </cac:AllowanceCharge> <!-- إجمالي الضرائب على مستوى الفاتورة --> <cac:TaxTotal> <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="JOD">0.00</cbc:TaxAmount> </cac:TaxTotal>
<!-- الإجماليات المالية --> <cac:LegalMonetaryTotal> <cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount currencyID="JOD">1.00</cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount> <cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount currencyID="JOD">1.00</cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount> <cbc:AllowanceTotalAmount currencyID="JOD">0.00</cbc:AllowanceTotalAmount> <cbc:PayableAmount currencyID="JOD">1.00</cbc:PayableAmount> </cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>
<!-- بنود الفاتورة --> <cac:InvoiceLine> <cbc:ID>1</cbc:ID> <cbc:InvoicedQuantity unitCode="PCE">1</cbc:InvoicedQuantity> <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="JOD">1.00</cbc:LineExtensionAmount> <cac:TaxTotal> <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="JOD">0.00</cbc:TaxAmount> <cbc:RoundingAmount currencyID="JOD">1.000</cbc:RoundingAmount> <cac:TaxSubtotal> <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="JOD">0.00</cbc:TaxAmount> <cac:TaxCategory> <cbc:ID schemeID="UN/ECE 5305">Z</cbc:ID> <cbc:Percent>0.00</cbc:Percent> <cac:TaxScheme> <cbc:ID schemeID="UN/ECE 5153">VAT</cbc:ID> </cac:TaxScheme> </cac:TaxCategory> </cac:TaxSubtotal> </cac:TaxTotal>
<cac:Item> <cbc:Name>Meal Service</cbc:Name> <cac:AdditionalItemProperty> <cbc:Name>ISIC4</cbc:Name> <cbc:Value>5610</cbc:Value> </cac:AdditionalItemProperty> </cac:Item> <cac:Price> <cbc:PriceAmount currencyID="JOD">1.00</cbc:PriceAmount> <cac:AllowanceCharge> <cbc:ChargeIndicator>false</cbc:ChargeIndicator> <cbc:AllowanceChargeReason>DISCOUNT</cbc:AllowanceChargeReason> <cbc:Amount currencyID="JOD">0.00</cbc:Amount> </cac:AllowanceCharge> </cac:Price> </cac:InvoiceLine> </Invoice>
